statements: SELECT id, user_id, water_consumed, date_recorded, location FROM water_usage
SELECT user_id, water_consumed, location, date_recorded, id FROM water_usage
SELECT date_recorded, water_consumed, user_id, id, location FROM water_usage
SELECT location, user_id, water_consumed, id, date_recorded FROM water_usage
SELECT water_consumed, location, id, user_id, date_recorded FROM water_usage
SELECT * FROM water_usage ORDER BY date_recorded DESC, user_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, user_id, water_consumed FROM water_usage WHERE water_consumed > 100 ORDER BY water_consumed DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(water_consumed) AS total_water_consumed FROM water_usage GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_water_consumed > 500
SELECT id, date_recorded, location FROM water_usage WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date_recorded ASC
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS usage_count FROM water_usage GROUP BY location ORDER BY usage_count DESC
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, usage FROM WaterConsumption WHERE usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM WaterMonitoring WHERE reading_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY water_level DESC;
SELECT id, location, reading_date FROM WaterMonitoring WHERE water_level < 50;
SELECT id, location, usage FROM WaterConsumption WHERE location LIKE '%city%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption
SELECT location, usage FROM WaterConsumption WHERE id = 1
SELECT SUM(usage) AS total_usage FROM WaterConsumption GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM WaterMonitoring ORDER BY reading_date DESC
SELECT MAX(water_level) AS max_water_level FROM WaterMonitoring WHERE location = 'Home'
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM water_meter_readings WHERE water_usage > 50 ORDER BY reading_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, reading_date, water_usage FROM water_meter_readings JOIN water_consumption ON water_meter_readings.reading_id = water_consumption.reading_id;
SELECT username, email, password FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE '%john%' AND email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT u.username, w.reading_date, wc.usage_category FROM user_accounts u INNER JOIN water_meter_readings w ON u.user_id = w.device_id INNER JOIN water_consumption wc ON u.user_id = wc.user_id WHERE wc.usage_amount > 100 ORDER BY wc.usage_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM water_meter_readings;
SELECT MAX(usage_amount) AS max_consumption FROM water_consumption WHERE usage_category = 'industrial';
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption
SELECT location, usage_gallons FROM WaterConsumption WHERE id = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM WaterUsageHistory
SELECT location, SUM(usage_gallons) AS total_usage FROM WaterConsumption GROUP BY location
SELECT location, average_daily_usage FROM WaterConsumptionStats ORDER BY average_daily_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(usage_gallons) AS total_usage FROM WaterConsumption GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageHistory WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY location ASC, date DESC;
SELECT location, average_daily_usage FROM WaterConsumptionStats WHERE average_daily_usage > 100 ORDER BY average_daily_usage DESC;
SELECT location, forecasted_usage FROM WaterUsageForecast WHERE forecast_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM water_sources WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM water_sources ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM water_sources WHERE water_type = 'Spring' AND capacity > 1000
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT date, amount_used FROM usage_history WHERE amount_used > 50 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM water_sources WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT source_name, water_type FROM water_sources WHERE capacity > 1000
SELECT * FROM water_usage WHERE amount_used > 50 AND unit = 'liters'
SELECT users.full_name, usage_history.date FROM users JOIN usage_history ON users.user_id = usage_history.user_id
SELECT alert_msg, alert_type FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 123
